display_html:
class Protocol ps where
  • data Message ps (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps)
  • data ClientHasAgency (st ∷ ps)
  • data ServerHasAgency (st ∷ ps)
  • data NobodyHasAgency (st ∷ ps)
  • exclusionLemma_ClientAndServerHaveAgency ∷ ∀ (st ∷ ps). ClientHasAgency st → ServerHasAgency st → Void
  • exclusionLemma_NobodyAndClientHaveAgency ∷ ∀ (st ∷ ps). NobodyHasAgency st → ClientHasAgency st → Void
  • exclusionLemma_NobodyAndServerHaveAgency ∷ ∀ (st ∷ ps). NobodyHasAgency st → ServerHasAgency st → Void
name: Protocol Message ClientHasAgency ServerHasAgency NobodyHasAgency exclusionLemma_ClientAndServerHaveAgency exclusionLemma_NobodyAndClientHaveAgency exclusionLemma_NobodyAndServerHaveAgency

display_html:
data PeerRole
  • = AsClient
  • | AsServer
name: PeerRole AsClient AsServer

display_html:
data TokPeerRole (peerRole ∷ PeerRole) where
  • TokAsClient ∷ TokPeerRole AsClient
  • TokAsServer ∷ TokPeerRole AsServer
name: TokPeerRole TokAsClient TokAsServer

display_html: type family FlipAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) where ...
name: FlipAgency

display_html:
data PeerHasAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) where
  • ClientAgency ∷ !(ClientHasAgency st) → PeerHasAgency AsClient st
  • ServerAgency ∷ !(ServerHasAgency st) → PeerHasAgency AsServer st
name: PeerHasAgency ClientAgency ServerAgency

display_html: type WeHaveAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) st = PeerHasAgency pr st
name: WeHaveAgency

display_html: type TheyHaveAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) st = PeerHasAgency (FlipAgency pr) st
name: TheyHaveAgency

display_html:
data Peer ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) m a where
  • Effect ∷ m (Peer ps pr st m a) → Peer ps pr st m a
  • Done ∷ !(NobodyHasAgency st) → a → Peer ps pr st m a
  • Yield ∷ !(WeHaveAgency pr st) → Message ps st st' → Peer ps pr st' m a → Peer ps pr st m a
  • Await ∷ !(TheyHaveAgency pr st) → (∀ st'. Message ps st st' → Peer ps pr st' m a) → Peer ps pr st m a
name: Peer Done Yield Effect Await

display_html:
data PeerPipelined ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) m a where
  • PeerPipelined ∷ PeerSender ps pr st Z c m a → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a
name: PeerPipelined PeerPipelined

display_html:
data PeerSender ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) (n ∷ Outstanding) c m a where
  • SenderEffect ∷ m (PeerSender ps pr st n c m a) → PeerSender ps pr st n c m a
  • SenderDone ∷ !(NobodyHasAgency st) → a → PeerSender ps pr st Z c m a
  • SenderYield ∷ !(WeHaveAgency pr st) → Message ps st st' → PeerSender ps pr st' Z c m a → PeerSender ps pr st Z c m a
  • SenderAwait ∷ !(TheyHaveAgency pr st) → (∀ st'. Message ps st st' → PeerSender ps pr st' Z c m a) → PeerSender ps pr st Z c m a
  • SenderPipeline ∷ !(WeHaveAgency pr st) → Message ps st st' → PeerReceiver ps pr (st' ∷ ps) (st'' ∷ ps) m c → PeerSender ps pr (st'' ∷ ps) (S n) c m a → PeerSender ps pr (st ∷ ps) n c m a
  • SenderCollect ∷ Maybe (PeerSender ps pr (st ∷ ps) (S n) c m a) → (c → PeerSender ps pr (st ∷ ps) n c m a) → PeerSender ps pr (st ∷ ps) (S n) c m a
name: PeerSender SenderEffect SenderDone SenderYield SenderAwait SenderPipeline SenderCollect

display_html:
data PeerReceiver ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) (stdone ∷ ps) m c where
  • ReceiverEffect ∷ m (PeerReceiver ps pr st stdone m c) → PeerReceiver ps pr st stdone m c
  • ReceiverDone ∷ c → PeerReceiver ps pr stdone stdone m c
  • ReceiverAwait ∷ !(TheyHaveAgency pr st) → (∀ st'. Message ps st st' → PeerReceiver ps pr st' stdone m c) → PeerReceiver ps pr st stdone m c
name: PeerReceiver ReceiverEffect ReceiverDone ReceiverAwait

display_html: type Outstanding = N
name: Outstanding

display_html:
data N
  • = Z
  • | S N
name: N S Z

display_html:
data Nat (n ∷ N) where
  • pattern Zero ∷ () ⇒ Z ~ n ⇒ Nat n
  • pattern Succ ∷ () ⇒ m ~ S n ⇒ Nat n → Nat m
name: Nat Zero Succ

display_html: natToInt ∷ Nat n → Int
name: natToInt

display_html: unsafeIntToNat ∷ Int → Nat n
name: unsafeIntToNat

display_html: fmapPeerPipelined ∷ (∀ c. PeerSender ps pr st Z c m a → PeerSender ps' pr st' Z c m b) → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → PeerPipelined ps' pr st' m b
name: fmapPeerPipelined

display_html:
data Driver ps dstate m = Driver {
  • sendMessage ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → Message ps st st' → m ()
  • recvMessage ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → dstate → m (SomeMessage st, dstate)
  • startDState ∷ dstate
}
name: Driver Driver sendMessage recvMessage startDState

display_html:
data SomeMessage (st ∷ ps) where
  • SomeMessage ∷ Message ps st st' → SomeMessage st
name: SomeMessage SomeMessage

display_html: runPeerWithDriver ∷ ∀ ps (st ∷ ps) pr dstate m a. Monad m ⇒ Driver ps dstate m → Peer ps pr st m a → dstate → m (a, dstate)
name: runPeerWithDriver

display_html: runPipelinedPeerWithDriver ∷ ∀ ps (st ∷ ps) pr dstate m a. MonadAsync m ⇒ Driver ps dstate m → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → dstate → m (a, dstate)
name: runPipelinedPeerWithDriver

display_html:
data Codec ps failure m bytes = Codec {
  • encode ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → Message ps st st' → bytes
  • decode ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → m (DecodeStep bytes failure m (SomeMessage st))
}
name: Codec Codec encode decode

display_html: hoistCodec ∷ Functor n ⇒ (∀ x. m x → n x) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure n bytes
name: hoistCodec

display_html: isoCodec ∷ Functor m ⇒ (bytes → bytes') → (bytes' → bytes) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure m bytes'
name: isoCodec

display_html: mapFailureCodec ∷ Functor m ⇒ (failure → failure') → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure' m bytes
name: mapFailureCodec

display_html:
data PeerRole
  • = AsClient
  • | AsServer
name: PeerRole AsClient AsServer

display_html:
data PeerHasAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) where
  • ClientAgency ∷ !(ClientHasAgency st) → PeerHasAgency AsClient st
  • ServerAgency ∷ !(ServerHasAgency st) → PeerHasAgency AsServer st
name: PeerHasAgency ClientAgency ServerAgency

display_html: type WeHaveAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) st = PeerHasAgency pr st
name: WeHaveAgency

display_html: type TheyHaveAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) st = PeerHasAgency (FlipAgency pr) st
name: TheyHaveAgency

display_html:
data SomeMessage (st ∷ ps) where
  • SomeMessage ∷ Message ps st st' → SomeMessage st
name: SomeMessage SomeMessage

display_html:
data CodecFailure
  • = CodecFailureOutOfInput
  • | CodecFailure String
name: CodecFailure CodecFailure CodecFailureOutOfInput

display_html:
data DecodeStep bytes failure m a
  • = DecodePartial (Maybe bytes → m (DecodeStep bytes failure m a))
  • | DecodeDone a (Maybe bytes)
  • | DecodeFail failure
name: DecodeStep DecodePartial DecodeDone DecodeFail

display_html: runDecoder ∷ Monad m ⇒ [bytes] → DecodeStep bytes failure m a → m (Either failure a)
name: runDecoder

display_html: runDecoderPure ∷ Monad m ⇒ (∀ b. m b → b) → m (DecodeStep bytes failure m a) → [bytes] → Either failure a
name: runDecoderPure

display_html:
data AnyMessage ps where
  • AnyMessage ∷ Message ps st st' → AnyMessage ps
name: AnyMessage AnyMessage

display_html:
data AnyMessageAndAgency ps where
  • AnyMessageAndAgency ∷ PeerHasAgency pr (st ∷ ps) → Message ps (st ∷ ps) (st' ∷ ps) → AnyMessageAndAgency ps
name: AnyMessageAndAgency AnyMessageAndAgency

display_html: prop_codecM ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → m Bool
name: prop_codecM

display_html: prop_codec ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → Bool
name: prop_codec

display_html: prop_codec_splitsM ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ (bytes → [[bytes]]) → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → m Bool
name: prop_codec_splitsM

display_html: prop_codec_splits ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps)) ⇒ (bytes → [[bytes]]) → (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → Bool
name: prop_codec_splits

display_html: prop_codec_binary_compatM ∷ ∀ psA psB failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage psA)) ⇒ Codec psA failure m bytes → Codec psB failure m bytes → (∀ pr (stA ∷ psA). PeerHasAgency pr stA → SamePeerHasAgency pr psB) → AnyMessageAndAgency psA → m Bool
name: prop_codec_binary_compatM

display_html: prop_codec_binary_compat ∷ ∀ psA psB failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage psA)) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec psA failure m bytes → Codec psB failure m bytes → (∀ pr (stA ∷ psA). PeerHasAgency pr stA → SamePeerHasAgency pr psB) → AnyMessageAndAgency psA → Bool
name: prop_codec_binary_compat

display_html: prop_codecs_compatM ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps), ∀ a. Monoid a ⇒ Monoid (m a)) ⇒ Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → m Bool
name: prop_codecs_compatM

display_html: prop_codecs_compat ∷ ∀ ps failure m bytes. (Monad m, Eq (AnyMessage ps), ∀ a. Monoid a ⇒ Monoid (m a)) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Codec ps failure m bytes → Codec ps failure m bytes → AnyMessageAndAgency ps → Bool
name: prop_codecs_compat

display_html:
data SamePeerHasAgency (pr ∷ PeerRole) (ps ∷ Type) where
  • SamePeerHasAgency ∷ ∀ (pr ∷ PeerRole) ps (st ∷ ps). PeerHasAgency pr st → SamePeerHasAgency pr ps
name: SamePeerHasAgency SamePeerHasAgency

display_html: connect ∷ ∀ ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) m a b. (Monad m, Protocol ps) ⇒ Peer ps pr st m a → Peer ps (FlipAgency pr) st m b → m (a, b, TerminalStates ps)
name: connect

display_html:
data TerminalStates ps where
  • TerminalStates ∷ ∀ ps (st ∷ ps). NobodyHasAgency st → NobodyHasAgency st → TerminalStates ps
name: TerminalStates TerminalStates

display_html: connectPipelined ∷ ∀ ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) m a b. (Monad m, Protocol ps) ⇒ [Bool] → PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → Peer ps (FlipAgency pr) st m b → m (a, b, TerminalStates ps)
name: connectPipelined

display_html: forgetPipelined ∷ ∀ ps (pr ∷ PeerRole) (st ∷ ps) m a. Functor m ⇒ PeerPipelined ps pr st m a → Peer ps pr st m a
name: forgetPipelined

display_html:
data Queue (n ∷ N) a where
  • EmptyQ ∷ Queue Z a
  • ConsQ ∷ a → Queue n a → Queue (S n) a
name: Queue EmptyQ ConsQ

display_html: enqueue ∷ a → Queue n a → Queue (S n) a
name: enqueue

display_html: pipelineInterleaving ∷ Int → [Bool] → [req] → [resp] → [Either req resp]
name: pipelineInterleaving

display_html: module Network.TypedProtocol.Core
module Network.TypedProtocol.Proofs
module Network.TypedProtocol.Driver
module Network.TypedProtocol.Pipelined
